arrested development: i was workin at franklins field picking cotton picking greens the sun came down i had to pass you to grind up his cornmeal and every time i did i wish you could stay around we were just two slaves in a crowded field of slaves me a housemaid but we had such a jones for each other ironically in the midst of these conditions theres still love  conditional love ironically in the midst of these conditions conditional love  matter of fact id risk being abused by the overseer for a moment to get to know your life i mean our lives aint that important your physical life is the same ol bad condition as mine but im talking bout your dreams the things that cant be taken by no one your love  conditional love ironically in the midst of these conditions conditional love
